citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
07/08/2014. No one was available to conduct an inspection at that time. Verbal contact was made with the
licensee and a schedule of available times and dates was given to the inspector.
This was the Third Attempted Inspection in a row.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
07/08/2014.  No one was available to conduct an inspection at that time.  Verbal contact was made with the
licensee and a schedule of available times and dates was given to the inspector.
This was the Third Attempted Inspection in a row.
